header.title: NH35 vs SW200-1 Movement Guide
header.subtitle: Choose the Perfect Heart for Your Next Timepiece

intro_section.headline: Every Great Watch Starts with a Great Movement
intro_section.description: Whether you're selecting your next conversation starter or understanding what makes your current favorite tick, this guide breaks down everything you need to know about these two legendary movements.

NH35.description: Built for daily wear and real-world performance
why_choose: You want rock-solid reliability for daily wear
You want maximum longevity from your timepiece
You plan to wear it every day without babying it
real_world_benefits: Proven track record across millions of watches
Easy serviceability anywhere in the world

SW200-1.description: Refined engineering for the discerning collector
why_choose: You want the smoothest possible second hand sweep
real_world_benefits: Superior finishing you can see and feel
Flexible design options for unique builds

daily_experience.title: What You'll Notice Wearing It
nh35_highlights: Solid, substantial feel on the wrist

long_term_ownership.title: Years Down the Road
long_term_ownership.nh35_story: Your NH35 will be the reliable companion that just keeps going. It's built to handle whatever life throws at it, maintaining consistent performance for decades.
long_term_ownership.sw200_story: Your SW200-1 represents Swiss watchmaking heritage. It's a movement that appreciates in character over time, becoming a treasured part of your collection.
